definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Gentamycin was brought from Sanming pharmaceutical factory of Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 庆大霉素购自福建三明制药厂。

sentences.english: To the diarrhoea enteritis patient of gentamicin allergy , with what injection cure?
sentences.chinese: 对于庆大霉素过敏的腹泻肠炎患者，用什么针剂治疗？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the attenuation of gentamicin-induced ototoxicity with Salvia miltiorrhiza.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨丹参对庆大霉素耳毒性的减毒作用。

sentences.english: The concentration characteristics of nanofiltration membrane for treating Gentamicin B solution were presented.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了纳滤膜对庆大霉素B溶液的浓缩性能。

sentences.english: In the 36 controls, gentamycin and dexamethasone was used as the irrigation fluid.
sentences.chinese: 对照组36眼泪道阻塞用庆大霉素和地塞米松冲洗。

sentences.english: Cochlear hair cell change of guinea pigs at different time following gentamicin ototoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 庆大霉素中毒后不同时间豚鼠耳蜗毛细胞变化。

sentences.english: The concentrations of cefazolin from both materials were lower than those of gentamycin.
sentences.chinese: 三种陶瓷洗脱液中头孢唑林浓度均低于庆大霉素浓度。

sentences.english: The immunogen is used for immunizing the New Zealand white rabbits to obtain the gentamicin polyclonal antibody.
sentences.chinese: 用免疫原，免疫新西兰大白兔，获得庆大霉素多抗。
